message: By the time I finally start to drift off, the sun is already peeking through my curtains.
My Coil rings, dragging me out of my slumber.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah?"

name: ウイルス
message: "Aoba? Did I wake you?"
That voice...
I look at the name on my Coil.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh... Virus?"

name: ウイルス
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's up?"

name: ウイルス
message: "Oh, it's just awful. I need you to stay calm and listen to what I'm about to tell you. The police are headed to your residence."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What?"
This jolts me wide awake. I lean forward, bringing the coil closer to my face.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why?"

name: ウイルス
message: "That, I don't know. What I do know is that there are quite a lot of them headed your way."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You've gotta be kidding..."

name: ウイルス
message: "At any rate, I recommend you run. The police are making things hard for me, too, but I'll contact you again if I hear anything."

name: ウイルス
message: "Do take care."
What the hell is going on?
Suddenly, the gentle light at my window doubles in intensity, as if time has leapt forward, skipping straight to noon.
I get out of bed, walk to the window, and part the curtains slightly.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ugh, too bright..."
I squint, trying to see outside.
And there, in the early morning haze, I see a crowd of police officers and their vehicles assembled in front of my building.

name: 悪島
message: "Hey! Hey! HEEEEEY! Get your asses out here! I know you're in there, you damn terrorists!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell?!"
That's Akushima's voice!

name: 悪島
message: "The charges are! Trespassing! Property damage! And every single other thing―however small―you shits have ever done!!!"

name: 悪島
message: "Seragaki Aoba! Get out here! And bring your stinking friends with you!"
The sound of my name drives it home. This mess is about me!
Since when am I a terrorist?!
